title: Rust Option Enum Handling Failure
description: In this lab, you will learn about the Option<T> enum in Rust, which provides two variants (None and Some(value)) to handle failure or lack of value in a program.

meta.title: Mastering Rust's Option Enum for Handling Failures
meta.description: Learn how to use Rust's Option enum to handle failures and lack of values in your programs.

i18n.title: Rust Option 열거형을 이용한 오류 처리
